attributes.action: Ukrainians to enter UK without requiring a visa application.i
attributes.additional_details: The current Russian invasion of Ukraine makes Ukraine unsafe for its citizens. The elderly, infirm, women and children need the support of their families in the UK.
attributes.background: Ukrainians who reach Paris, Lille or Calais, and who have family in the U.K., to be granted leave to enter on humanitarian grounds without requiring a visa application.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
